modName: Going to the temple of Maura Erandur and we are gonna get married
summary:
Erandur is one of my favorite Dark Elves because he’s got more personality and background than most. So why not make him available marriage?

Keep his vanilla look with this simple mod.
descriptionHtml:
Erandur is one of my favorite Dark Elves because he’s got more personality and background than most. So why not make him available marriage?

“Yes my daughter/son?”

Oh um… well that can be a little awkward but as far as I know he doesn't call you that after he becomes your follower. So why not take him to the temple of Mara and pop the question.

[b][size=+2]Requirements?[/b][/size]
None-well except for doing the usual mission to get him to be a follower.

[b][size=+2]Recommendations:[/b][/size]

UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii

Straight hair retexture by navetsea

Smooth Faces for Ladies and Gents by pikkatze and/or Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul

[center][b][size=+2]Lastly, a BIG thank you to...[/size]
Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1 by foretrenty

Enjoy and please let me know of any issues. :)
If you like this please remember to endorse and send photos
(Photos of you being happy with him gives me warm fuzzies and encourages me to keep making more mods)[/center][/b]

Version Log:
1.0
author: CeaseSphire
